sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script will set the instances with empty integration type to agile</description> <name>Set instance with empty IntType to Agile</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var commonInstanceGr = new GlideRecord("sn_int_common_instance"); commonInstanceGr.addNullQuery('integration_type'); commonInstanceGr.setValue('integration_type', '87baddf953f40010807bddeeff7b127c'); commonInstanceGr.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-28 12:00:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0df0c60877300110edc29ba07d5a99af</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set instance with empty IntType to Agile</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">75f8d53373fe330001073cf2c4f6a7b6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">75f8d53373fe330001073cf2c4f6a7b6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0df0c60877300110edc29ba07d5a99af</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-29 11:34:33</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set instance with empty IntType to Agile
